articles.title: Drink up but hold the sugar: Unsweetened coffee linked to weight loss, study reveals - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A recent study in The American Journal of Clinical Nutrition reveals that increasing the intake of unsweetened coffee, whether caffeinated or decaffeinated, is associated with reduced weight gain. Adding sugar to coffee, however, could negate these health ben…
articles.content:
A recent study published in The American Journal of Clinical Nutrition finds that an increase in unsweetened coffee consumption reduces the risk of body weight gain.

articles.title: A ‘ring of fire’ solar eclipse is coming soon. Here’s what you should know - CNN
articles.description: An annular solar eclipse will create a stunning “ring of fire” in the sky on October 14, visible to millions living across North, Central and South America.
